translation: It's not possible to part with the tathāgata of the śrāvaka vehicle, nor the solitary realizer vehicle or the supreme vehicle; it's not possible to part with the tathāgata of the true nature of the śrāvaka vehicle, nor the solitary realizer vehicle or the supreme vehicle; it's not possible to part with the tathāgata of the Dharma-nature of the śrāvaka vehicle, nor the solitary realizer vehicle or the supreme vehicle; it's not possible to part with the tathāgata of the Dharma-nature of the śrāvaka vehicle, nor the solitary realizer vehicle or the supreme vehicle; it's not possible to part with the tathāgata of the Dharma-nature of the śrāvaka vehicle, nor the solitary realizer vehicle or the supreme vehicle.
